gloss: slender insect with delicate membranous wings having an aquatic larval stage and terrestrial adult stage usually lasting less than two days
an instance or single occasion for some event
social insect living in organized colonies; characteristically the males and fertile queen have wings during breeding season; wingless sterile females are the workers
(biology) a taxonomic group that is a division of a species; usually arises as a consequence of geographical isolation within a species
a flight by an aircraft over a particular area (especially over an area in foreign territory)
